content: Hi there! I'm Ioannis, an experienced ServiceNow Developer adept in Strategic Portfolio Management (SPM), IT Service Management (ITSM), Security Operations (SecOps), and Automated Test Framework (ATF). Drawing on both out-of-the-box and custom implementations, I streamline and elevate enterprise workflows. Beyond ServiceNow, I’m an R&D Engineer exploring LLMs, computer vision, microcomputers, and sensors to spark innovative solutions. I’m also proud to be part of Pop2See, where we develop accessible digital solutions for individuals with visual impairments. Let’s collaborate TOGETHER!
